newestpages-header: Parameters * $1 - limit of number of pages (value of $wgNewestPagesLimit) See also: * {{msg-mw|Newestpages-ns-header}}
newestpages-limitlinks:
Parameters:
* $1 - a list of links (pipe-separated), like "10 | 20 | 30 | 50 | 100 | 150"
newestpages-none: Used if the query result is empty.
newestpages-ns-header: Parameters * $1 - limit of number of pages (value of $wgNewestPagesLimit) * $2 - namespace name See also: * {{msg-mw|Newestpages-header}}
newestpages-showing:
This message is followed by the list of newest pages. Parameters:
* $1 - number of pages
